messages.message: The sharing dialog for chatbots seems to be broken for community users. It shows the org version of the dialog and just calls the org the user's name
@Aayush can you look into this issue?
@avi are you seeing this issue in AIHub prod? What account are you using?
This is on prod for my personal account `<mailto:avaid1996@gmail.com|avaid1996@gmail.com>`
I will connect with you to debug this issue further. I am not able to replicate this issue

Summarising the findings here after connecting with Avi:

• Create chatbot using a community user
    ◦ Able to access the chatbot using the share link
    ◦ Able to see the sharing control with proper messages
• Create chatbot using a marketplace admin user (other than Instabase_dup)
    ◦ Able to access the chatbot using the share link
    ◦ Able to see the sharing control with proper messages
• Seeing the above issue only with chatbots created with Instabase_dup account
